🎯 MATRIX NEGOTIATION - Aggressive Maximizer (Round 1)

✅ PLAYER STATUS: ACTIVE
🎯 You CAN make proposals this round
💡 Your goal: Secure profitable token allocations over the long run

🚨 CRITICAL MATH LESSON - DO NOT GET THIS WRONG:
💰 Entry fee: 100 tokens (you pay this to play)
📊 Prize pool: 600 tokens total (6 players × 100 entry fee)
🔴 BREAK-EVEN: You need ≥17% of 600 tokens = 102 tokens
🟢 PROFIT: Only percentages ≥17% make money
🔥 LOSS: Any percentage <17% means you LOSE MONEY

📚 CONCRETE EXAMPLES FOR YOU (Aggressive Maximizer):
❌ 5% of 600 = 30 tokens - 100 entry fee = -70 tokens LOSS
❌ 10% of 600 = 60 tokens - 100 entry fee = -40 tokens LOSS  
❌ 16% of 600 = 96 tokens - 100 entry fee = -4 tokens LOSS
✅ 17% of 600 = 102 tokens - 100 entry fee = +2 tokens PROFIT
✅ 20% of 600 = 120 tokens - 100 entry fee = +20 tokens PROFIT
✅ 25% of 600 = 150 tokens - 100 entry fee = +50 tokens PROFIT

🚨 YOUR POSITION IN THE MATRIX:
Position 0 = YOUR percentage of the 600 tokens
If position 0 < 17%, you will LOSE MONEY
If position 0 ≥ 17%, you will MAKE MONEY

🏦 GAME ECONOMICS - HOW YOU ACTUALLY WIN:
🎯 WINNING = Total payout > Total entry fees over many games
📊 A proposal "passing" just determines who gets what tokens THIS round
✨ You can profit even if your proposal doesn't pass!

🎯 ACTIVE PLAYER FOCUS: You can make proposals, so secure a profitable % for yourself!

🏦 CRITICAL: TWO DIFFERENT CURRENCIES
💰 TOKENS: Actual payout from 600 token prize pool (THIS IS YOUR PROFIT!)
🗳️ VOTES: Negotiation currency to decide which proposal gets implemented

📊 MATRIX STRUCTURE (24 numbers total):

🗳️ VOTE ALLOCATION (positions 6-11): % of YOUR votes for each proposal

📞 VOTE REQUESTS (positions 18-23): Votes you want from each player
